ej,sotom001,P,ripps901,Fair/foul call (Bumped umpire) ej,freyj801,M,rungp901,Reversal of fair/foul call $Pitcher Soto ejected by 3B umpire Rippley for arguing that apparent home run by Cey was foul; he bumped umpire during argument; the call was reversed and Cubs manager Frey ejected by HP umpire Runge; as Soto was led back to the bench, a Wrigley Field vendor hit Soto with a cup of ice; Soto was suspended for 5 days; both teams played the rest of the game under protest; the delay for the brawl and ejections was 32 minutes
ej,bowal001,P,harrl901,Balls and strikes Larry Bowa ejected by HP umpire Lanny Harris when the fourth pitch is called a strike
Joe Lefebvre injured on play
A total guess... Moreland missing E

$RF Doug Frobel played infield between 1B and 2B
$Leon Lacy played between 3B and SS
ej,willd104,M,grege901,Requesting appeal of check swing $Padres manager Williams ejected by HP umpire Gregg for arguing that appeal should have been made to 1B umpire on check swing by Sandberg

$line drive off Lee Smith's shoulder, deflected in air to SS for out, then throw to first to complete DP
$squeeze play and pitch way inside so Larry Bowa could not bunt
